title: FYP Project
text: This is my Week 02 Lab Assessment for AAI1001-Data Engineering and Visualization.

title: FYP Project
text: This is my Week 02 Lab Assessment for AAI1001-Data Engineering and Visualization.

title: FYP Project
text:
My role
I am the sole developer for this project.

title: Data Visualization
text:
This visualization shows the relationship between car weight and fue

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  labs(
    title = "Fuel Efficiency vs Car Weight",
    x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
    y = "Miles per gallon (mpg)"
  )

`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: For this assessment, I used ChatGPT as the main GenAI tool. I chose this tool because it is effective for explaining technical concepts clearly, providing structured guidance, and assisting with problem-solving in a step-by-step manner.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: For this assessment, I used ChatGPT as the main GenAI tool. I chose this tool because it is effective for explaining technical concepts clearly, providing structured guidance, and assisting with problem-solving in a step-by-step manner.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How GenAI helped me complete the assessment
text:
How GenAI helped me complete the assessment
ChatGPT helped me understand how to build and structure a Quarto website using RStudio.
For example, it guided me in: - Creating and organizing .qmd files - Configuring the _quarto.yml file for website navigation - Debugging issues such as broken navigation links and missing rendered pages - Creating a valid data visualization using R and ggplot2
These examples helped me complete the tasks more efficiently while still requiring me to implement and verify the solutions myself.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Benefits of using GenAI
One major benefit of using GenAI is efficiency. It reduces the time needed to search for documentation and provides direct, relevant explanations.
Another benefit is clarity, as complex concepts such as Quarto rendering and website structure were broken down into manageable steps.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Challenges of using GenAI
A challenge of using GenAI is that its suggestions still need to be verified. In some cases, minor mistakes such as incorrect file names or missing rendering steps can occur if the user follows suggestions blindly. This reinforced the importance of understanding the tools rather than relying entirely on AI-generated responses.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Future use of GenAI
In the future, I believe GenAI tools will assist me in my studies and work by helping with debugging, learning new technologies, and drafting technical documentation. However, I will continue to treat GenAI as a support tool rather than a replacement for critical thinking.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Additional thoughts
Overall, using GenAI in this assessment enhanced my learning experience by providing guidance while still requiring active engagement. When used responsibly, GenAI can be a valuable learning companion.

title: Data Visualization
text:
Story behind the visualization
I chose a scatter plot because it is effective for showing the relationship between two numerical variables.
Each point represents a car, allowing comparisons across different weights.
The smooth trend line helps highlight the overall relationship between car weight and fuel efficiency, making the pattern easier to interpret.

title: Data Visualization
text:
What was visualized

wt (weight) – numerical variable representing car weight
mpg (fuel efficiency) – numerical variable representing fuel efficiency
